name: Once upon a time, there was a giant cat
name_original: Once upon a time, there was a giant cat
description: This is game is a elaboration project based on the original narrative game (https://bfod.itch.io/narrative-clone-assignment). In the game, player will play as a rabbit, (yes indeed, you are a rabbit) to invest the property of the cooperation in a space station. By interacting with item and character in the game, you will soon find out the hidden secret in the station.
